statements: SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payer_account FROM payment_transactions WHERE payer_account = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_id > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE payer_account='Alice'
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT transaction_id, payer_account, payee_account FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM payment_transactions WHERE payee_account='Bob'
SELECT payment_id, amount, currency, time_stamp FROM payments;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, registration_date FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, currency, amount FROM payments ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT amount, currency FROM payments WHERE time_stamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, amount, currency, time_stamp FROM payments ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT customers.name, payments.payment_amount FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id WHERE payments.payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY customers.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'pending' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT transactions.timestamp, customers.name FROM transactions JOIN customers ON transactions.transaction_id = payments.transaction_id ORDER BY transactions.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT method_name, description FROM payment_methods
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, method_id FROM payment_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users INNER JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id WHERE payment_history.status = 'success' ORDER BY users.created_at ASC;

SELECT users.username, payment_methods.method_name, payment_history.timestamp FROM users LEFT JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id LEFT JOIN payment_methods ON payment_history.method_id = payment_methods.method_id;

SELECT users.username, payment_history.status, payment_methods.description FROM users JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id JOIN payment_methods ON payment_history.method_id = payment_methods.method_id WHERE payment_history.status = 'failed';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT type, amount FROM transactions WHERE status='pending';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, amount, due_date FROM invoices WHERE paid=true;
SELECT description, timestamp FROM transactions_history WHERE user_id=1234567890;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT t.amount, t.status, u.username FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.id = u.user_id WHERE t.amount > 1000;
SELECT p.method_id, p.method_type, u.username FROM payment_methods p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.method_type = 'credit_card';
SELECT i.invoice_id, i.amount, u.username FROM invoices i JOIN users u ON i.user_id = u.user_id WHERE i.due_date < CURRENT_DATE;
